UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Outer-membrane-acting peptides and lipid II-targeting antibiotics cooperatively kill Gram-negative pathogens.
Literature.Author: Li Q, Cebrián R, Montalbán-López M, Ren H, Wu W, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli LMG 15862(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 6395(MIC=16µM),Acinetobacter baumannii LMG 01041(MIC=>256µM),Klebsiella aerogenes LMG 02094(MIC=>256µM)
